LanguageData.JRWPachycephalosaurusReconstruct.label: Pachycephalosaurus
LanguageData.JRWPachycephalosaurusReconstruct.descrip:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03521-1931 [PACHYCEPHALOSAURUS WYOMINGENSIS] CODENAME: FRIAR-TUCK >9482
A pachycephalosaurid with a thick dome and a mottled cream and blue hide. Their calls have made them a nuisance, so much so small tribal villages will actively ward them away, lest they attract larger threats.
